title: Wilier Unico, limited artist-series Filante SLR road bike & more!
content:
Wilier has a new look in their art series celebrating Shimano’s 100th anniversary this year with a limited artist-edition run of Unico Filante SLR frames designed by Jun Inoue, “a contemporary artist whose work is deeply rooted in Japanese traditions.” Wilier Unico, limited artist-series road bike by Jun Inoue The Unico transforms Shodo, Japanese calligraphy

The post Wilier Unico, limited artist-series Filante SLR road bike & more! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
